author:
Ben Walker                                                    
                            AP
title: Ex-Cards 1B Mark Hamilton finishing med school just in time to fight virus in NY
description: Mark Hamilton is set to graduate a month early from medical school on Long Island. Next stop: the fight against the coronavirus pandemic in New York.
content:
NEW YORK If he wanted, Mark Hamilton could show off his World Series ring at work. But the fill-in first baseman for the 2011 champion St. Louis Cardinals prefers to keep that prize safe at home.
The surgical scrub tub, not the most conducive place to wear i… [+4887 chars]
